column4: Can somebody tell me how I can play a mms:// stream on Linux? It is a .wmv file
ok done. nevertheless, I don't know how to start mplayer ..
I am not that much a newbie :D .. You are asking me to run "mplayer mms:// " right?
No I got it through mplayer-386
just make sure ur path for the codecs show to the w32codec directory
I know I have w32codecs. The question is, how do I know if ~/.gxine/config points to the right direction or not?
in the config there is a path
where it says path to win32codecs
there u give path with sudo and save
Could I have a look somewhere?
I know it is in /usr/lib/win32. Do I just say "decoder.external.win32_codecs_path:/usr/lib/win32" where do I say sudo?
